scripts.get-libraries: (j=$((0x10)); find src/libraries test/helpers/libraries -type f | sed 's/.*\///' | sed 's/.sol//' | while read i; do echo -n "($i,$(printf "0x%x" $j))\n";j=$((j+1));done) | paste -sd, -
scripts.coverage: forge coverage --report lcov && lcov --remove lcov.info -o lcov.info 'test/*' 'script/*' && genhtml lcov.info -o report --branch-coverage && open report/index.html
